title: Antibody capture metrics
description: Schema for submitting metadata for metrics of an antibody capture library.

percent_reads_in_barcodes_with_high_umi_.title: Percent reads in barcodes with high umi counts
percent_reads_in_barcodes_with_high_umi_.description: Percentage of reads lost after removeing barcodes with unusually high UMI counts, which may have been formed by antibody aggregates.

percent_q30_bases_in_antibody_read.title: Percent Q30 bases in antibody read
percent_q30_bases_in_antibody_read.description: Percentage of bases from read containing the antibody barcode with Q-score >= 30, excluding very low quality/no-call (Q <= 2) bases from denominator.

percent_q30_bases_in_antibody_read_2.title: Percent Q30 bases in antibody read 2

percent_reads_in_aggregate_barcodes.title: Percent antibody reads in aggregate barcodes
percent_reads_in_aggregate_barcodes.description: Percentage of reads lost after removing aggregate barcodes.

percent_reads_recognized_antibody.title: Percent antibody reads
percent_reads_recognized_antibody.description: Percentage of reads that contain a recognized antibody barcode.

percent_reads_usable.title: Percent antibody reads usable
percent_reads_usable.description: Percentage of reads that contain a recognized antibody barcode, a valid UMI, and a cell-associated barcode.

antibody_reads_usable_per_cell.title: Antibody reads
antibody_reads_usable_per_cell.description: Number of antibody reads usable divided by the number of cell-associated barcodes.

percent_reads_unrecognized_antibody.title: Percent reads unrecognized antibody
percent_reads_unrecognized_antibody.description: Among all reads, the percentage with an unrecognizable antibody barcode.

median_umis_per_cell.title: Median umis per cell
median_umis_per_cell.description: Median UMIs per cell (summed over all recognized antibody barcodes).
